title: Ep 98 | Ask the Robertsons: How Can I Reach Unbelievers in My Family?
description:
Phil, Jase, and Al share advice on how to help your husband, wife, or child get to know Jesus, even if they're resistant. Remember: Even Jesus had earthly family members who weren't believers. Jase stumps Phil and Al with his question about why June 1 is such a special day. And Phil introduces the resident gator, Pete.
